name: I Just Want to Game in Peace
author: Yuewen Manhua &#40阅文漫画&#41
content: Dimensional storms have descended and many extradimensional areas have appeared on Earth. All kinds of mysterious extradimensional lives are born in these extradimensional areas. In order to become strong, humans started to enter these dangerous areas to hunt and kill extradimensional creatures. But I, Zhou Wen, have made these extradimensional areas into instance dungeons in my mobile game. By levelling up my game character, I will be levelling up my strength in reality. When others are risking
